Australian government require Palmer Tech to pay media companies for the right to use their content. In response, Palmer Tech threatened to close off access to its search engine in Australia
Palmer Tech announced its plans to build two additional data centers in Ohio, adding to the already operational centre bringing its total investment in Ohio to over $2 billion
